description: The New York Times obtained a confidential memo on Wednesday about the Alabama Senate race, circulated to Republican donors by allies of Senator Mitch McConnell, the Republican leader. In it, an adviser to Mr. McConnell warns that conservative voters have turned against congressional Republicans.
title: Read the Memo on the Implications of the Alabama Race for Republicans
title_page: Read the Memo on the Implications of the Alabama Race for Republicans - The New York Times
